title: The Bachelorette's Angie Kent has tense confrontation with Jess Glasgow
text:
Bachelorette Angie Kent invited her brother Brad to go 'undercover' during the show's first cocktail party on Wednesday's premiere.

And tensions ran high when he informed his sister that suitor Jess Glasgow may not be on the show for the right reasons.

Brad - going by Mark to the male stars - said Jess would refuse her 'special 24HR rose' if offered, which urged her to furiously confront the aspiring politician.

The Bachelorette's Angie Kent (pictured) had a tense confrontation with Jess Glasgow on Wednesday after her 'undercover brother' Brad revealed he wasn't on the show for the right reasons

'Are you f***ing kidding me?' she said, adding: 'I am seeing red!'

Following her discussion with Brad, Angie confronted Jess about the rumour, asking him to confirm whether it was true.

'I've actually heard from some of the other guys that if I gave you a rose tonight, you weren't actually going to accept it,' she informed Jess.

Undercover: Brad (pictured)- going by Mark to the male stars - told Angie that Jessie said he would refuse her 'special 24HR rose' if offered

The suitor questioned: 'I wouldn't accept... Why wouldn't I accept it? I'm here for you, my girl, OK?'

Angie continued to confront Jess about the comment he had made earlier and asked him to tell the truth.

She said: 'This is just what I've heard. So I'm very unsure as to why somebody would tell me that. If you did say it, I'd rather you told me you said it.'

Drama: Angie immediately confronted Jess (pictured) about the rumour, asking him whether this was true

Jess denied saying that he would refuse her 'special 24HR rose' if it was offered to him. However, previous footage from the cocktail party contradicted his story.

'No. I said, "If Angie didn't give me a rose, I would accept that." OK? 'I would accept that,' he lied.

Angie assured him: 'I believe you. No. I'm really glad I got to speak to you about it.'
description: Bachelorette Angie Kent invited her brother Brad to go 'undercover' during the show's first cocktail party on Wednesday night.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
